data.Description:
A condition of blood deficiency.
Symptoms include fatigue and pale complexion.
Treatment involves nourishing the blood through diet, herbs, and lifestyle adjustments.

A sign of an internal disharmony.
Symptoms include daytime tiredness, irritability, depression or anxiety, reduced mental alertness and concentration, increased errors or accidents as well as ongoing worries about sleep.
Treatment involves nourishing the heart through diet, herbs, and lifestyle adjustments.
